verses.verse: בָּ֣אתִי <WH935> I am come לְגַנִּי֮ <WH1588> into my garden אֲחֹתִ֣י <WH269> my sister כַלָּה֒ <WH3618> [my] spouse אָרִ֤יתִי <WH717> I have gathered מוֹרִי֙ <WH4753> my myrrh עִם־ <WH5973> along בְּשָׂמִ֔י <WH1314> my balsam אָכַ֤לְתִּי <WH398> I have eaten יַעְרִי֙ <WH3293> my honeycomb עִם־ <WH5973> along דִּבְשִׁ֔י <WH1706> with my honey שָׁתִ֥יתִי <WH8354> I have drunk יֵינִ֖י <WH3196> my wine עִם־ <WH5973> along חֲלָבִ֑י <WH2461> with my milk אִכְל֣וּ <WH398> eat רֵעִ֔ים <WH7453> O friends שְׁת֥וּ <WH8354> drink וְשִׁכְר֖וּ <WH7937> yea drink abundantly דּוֹדִֽים׃ <WH1730> O beloved ס

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְשֵׁנָ֖ה <WH3462> grow old וְלִבִּ֣י <WH3820> but my heart עֵ֑ר <WH5782> waketh ק֣וֹל ׀ <WH6963> [it is] the voice דּוֹדִ֣י <WH1730> of my beloved דוֹפֵ֗ק <WH1849> that knocketh פִּתְחִי־ <WH6605> [saying] Open לִ֞י אֲחֹתִ֤י <WH269> to me my sister רַעְיָתִי֙ <WH7474> my love יוֹנָתִ֣י <WH3123> my dove תַמָּתִ֔י <WH8535> my undefiled שֶׁרֹּאשִׁי֙ <WH7218> for my head נִמְלָא־ <WH4390> is filled טָ֔ל <WH2919> with dew קְוֻּצּוֹתַ֖י <WH6977> [and] my locks רְסִ֥יסֵי <WH7447> with the drops לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> of the night

פָּשַׁ֙טְתִּי֙ <WH6584> I have put off אֶת־ <WH853> כֻּתָּנְתִּ֔י <WH3801> my coat אֵיכָ֖כָה <WH349> how אֶלְבָּשֶׁ֑נָּה <WH3847> shall I put it on רָחַ֥צְתִּי <WH7364> ? I have washed אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלַ֖י <WH7272> my feet אֵיכָ֥כָה <WH349> how אֲטַנְּפֵֽם׃ <WH2936> shall I defile

דּוֹדִ֗י <WH1730> My beloved שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> put in יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand מִן־ <WH4480> by הַחֹ֔ר <WH2356> the hole וּמֵעַ֖י <WH4578> [of the door] and my bowels הָמ֥וּ <WH1993> were moved עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

קַ֥מְתִּֽי <WH6965> I rose up אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I לִפְתֹּ֣חַ <WH6605> to open לְדוֹדִ֑י <WH1730> to my beloved וְיָדַ֣י <WH3027> and my hands נָֽטְפוּ־ <WH5197> dropped מ֗וֹר <WH4753> [with] myrrh וְאֶצְבְּעֹתַי֙ <WH676> and my fingers מ֣וֹר <WH4753> myrrh עֹבֵ֔ר <WH5674> [with] sweet smelling עַ֖ל <WH5921> on כַּפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> upon the handles הַמַּנְעֽוּל׃ <WH4514> of the lock

פָּתַ֤חְתִּֽי <WH6605> I opened אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I לְדוֹדִ֔י <WH1730> to my beloved וְדוֹדִ֖י <WH1730> but my beloved חָמַ֣ק <WH2559> had withdrawn עָבָ֑ר <WH5674> himself [and] was gone נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> my soul יָֽצְאָ֣ה <WH3318> failed בְדַבְּר֔וֹ <WH1696> when he spake בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <WH1245> I sought וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not מְצָאתִ֔יהוּ <WH4672> him but I could not find קְרָאתִ֖יו <WH7121> him I called וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָנָֽנִי׃ <WH6030> him but he gave me no answer

מְצָאֻ֧נִי <WH4672> found הַשֹּׁמְרִ֛ים <WH8104> The watchmen הַסֹּבְבִ֥ים <WH5437> that went about בָּעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city הִכּ֣וּנִי <WH5221> me they smote פְצָע֑וּנִי <WH6481> me they wounded נָשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> took away אֶת־ <WH853> רְדִידִי֙ <WH7289> my veil מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> me the keepers הַחֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH2346> of the walls

הִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> I charge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> you O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אִֽם־ <WH518> If תִּמְצְאוּ֙ <WH4672> if ye find אֶת־ <WH853> דּוֹדִ֔י <WH1730> my beloved מַה־ <WH4100> to what תַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> that ye tell ל֔וֹ שֶׁחוֹלַ֥ת <WH2470> him that I [am] sick אַהֲבָ֖ה <WH160> of love אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

מַה־ <WH4100> What דּוֹדֵ֣ךְ <WH1730> What [is] thy beloved מִדּ֔וֹד <WH1730> more than [another] beloved הַיָּפָ֖ה <WH3303> O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> ess מַה־ <WH4100> What דּוֹדֵ֣ךְ <WH1730> more than [another] beloved מִדּ֔וֹד <WH1730> is your beloved שֶׁכָּ֖כָה <WH3602> that thou הִשְׁבַּעְתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH7650> dost so charge
דּוֹדִ֥י <WH1730> My beloved צַח֙ <WH6703> [is] white וְאָד֔וֹם <WH122> and ruddy דָּג֖וּל <WH1713> the chiefest מֵרְבָבָֽה׃ <WH7233> among ten thousand

רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> His head כֶּ֣תֶם <WH3800> [is as] the most פָּ֑ז <WH6337> fine gold קְוּצּוֹתָיו֙ <WH6977> his locks תַּלְתַּלִּ֔ים <WH8534> [are] bushy שְׁחֹר֖וֹת <WH7838> [and] black כָּעוֹרֵֽב׃ <WH6158> as a raven

עֵינָ֕יו <WH5869> His eyes כְּיוֹנִ֖ים <WH3123> [are] as [the eyes] of doves עַל־ <WH5921> Beside אֲפִ֣יקֵי <WH650> by the rivers מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of waters רֹֽחֲצוֹת֙ <WH7364> washed בֶּֽחָלָ֔ב <WH2461> with milk יֹשְׁב֖וֹת <WH3427> reposed עַל־ <WH5921> Beside מִלֵּֽאת׃ <WH4402> in setting

לְחָיָו֙ <WH3895> His cheeks כַּעֲרוּגַ֣ת <WH6170> [are] as a bed הַבֹּ֔שֶׂם <WH1314> of spices מִגְדְּל֖וֹת <WH4026> flowers מֶרְקָחִ֑ים <WH4840> [as] sweet שִׂפְתוֹתָיו֙ <WH8193> his lips שֽׁוֹשַׁנִּ֔ים <WH7799> [like] lilies נֹטְפ֖וֹת <WH5197> dropping מ֥וֹר <WH4753> myrrh עֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> sweet smelling

יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> His hands גְּלִילֵ֣י <WH1550> rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> [are as] gold מְמֻלָּאִ֖ים <WH4390> set בַּתַּרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <WH8658> with the beryl מֵעָיו֙ <WH4578> his belly עֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6247> [is as] bright שֵׁ֔ן <WH8127> ivory מְעֻלֶּ֖פֶת <WH5968> overlaid סַפִּירִֽים׃ <WH5601> [with] sapphires

שׁוֹקָיו֙ <WH7785> His legs עַמּ֣וּדֵי <WH5982> [are as] pillars שֵׁ֔שׁ <WH8336> of marble מְיֻסָּדִ֖ים <WH3245> set עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְנֵי־ <WH134> upon sockets פָ֑ז <WH6337> of fine gold מַרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4758> his countenance כַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> [is] as Lebanon בָּח֖וּר <WH977> excellent כָּאֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH730> as the cedars

חִכּוֹ֙ <WH2441> His mouth מַֽמְתַקִּ֔ים <WH4477> [is] most sweet וְכֻלּ֖וֹ <WH3605> is wholly מַחֲמַדִּ֑ים <WH4261> yea he [is] altogether lovely זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This דוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> This [is] my beloved וְזֶ֣ה <WH2088> and this רֵעִ֔י <WH7453> and this [is] my friend בְּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem
